amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for local law enforcement block grants by $300 million; and offset this increase by eliminating all funding for prison grants to States, except for funds for incarcerating criminal aliens.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of July 24, as amendment No. 36, to increase funding for the local law enforcement block grants by $300 million; and offsets this increase by eliminating all funding for the prison grants to States, except for funds for incarcerating criminal aliens.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 105 - 321 (Roll no. 573).
